name: xnegrecl

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cxne(c0), cneg(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cxne(c0), cneg(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))

comment: The extended real negative of a real number is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
